Text: This one is real!!! audio and video superb!! Almost DVD Qualiy thanks for the upload Dezix2 Your a star!!!

On closer inspection it does have portugese subs that run over the original english ones when characters speak in portugese, you wont lose any of the plot though. its a lot better than all the rest of the crap offered up so far.
This is a mish mash of Russian dubbing, Portugese text and english. I do not recommend downloading this...
